name: Melody 1.1 (18+ Adult Visual Novel)
description:
Note: This game contains sexual content

This is an adult visual novel game where you, the protagonist, wakes up in your dorm and is greeted by a girl named Aya who claims you were previously kidnapped by a girl classmate named Rei the day before.  This is a visual novel that revolves around harem and mystery. 

All characters are 18+ years old in the game. 

Available for both PC and MAC

Note: This is an early first build
